statements: DELETE FROM supplier_data WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Corp' AND supplier_phone = '123-456-7890';
DELETE FROM supplier_products WHERE supplier_id = 1 AND product_price > 100.00;
DELETE FROM SupplierOrders WHERE supplier_id = 500 AND status = 'Pending'
DELETE FROM products WHERE price > 100.00 AND supplier_id IN (SELECT id FROM suppliers WHERE name = 'Supplier A');
DELETE FROM supplier_products WHERE supplier_id = 1 AND product_name = 'Product A';
DELETE FROM supplier_orders WHERE supplier_id = 3 AND total_amount > 500.00;
